name: Sniper vs Zombies 3D
description:
Sniper vs Zombies is survival game in a 3D shooter / shooting range genre . You play as a sniper and your task is to kill as many zombies as you can. Each wave of zombie becomes more faster and powerful, so you have to use your agility and accuracy. If you make a few headshots in a row you will get a bonus semi-auto rifle. Survive!

Features:
- Nice 3D graphics
- Choose Winter or Summer season
- Change weather (enable/disable snow and rain)
- Infinite fun gameplay
